title: Limitations on compliance with section 431:20-107
context: ยง431:20-109 Limitations on compliance with section 431:20-107 and section 431:20-108. If section 431:20-107 or section 431:20-108 requires a greater amount of capital and surplus or deposits than that required of a title insurer prior to July 1, 1988, such title insurer shall have three years after July 1, 1988, to comply with any such increase requirement. [L 1987, c 347, pt of ยง2] Revision Note &ldquo;July 1, 1988&rdquo; substituted for &ldquo;the effective date of this code&rdquo;.
